title: Zoe Zebra Loses Her Z
description: Zoe Zebra has lost her Z! Without it she’s just an Ebra! Come along with Zoe on a rhyming journey from A to Z, as your child meets a range of silly animals, from a smart kangaroo wearing blue to a herd of llamas in bright orange pajamas.  This fun children’s book will introduce your child to the alphabet through repetition and rhymes. You’ll laugh out loud as you explore the vibrant pictures and funny poems, which your child will enjoy reading over and over again. Perfect for preschool kids to enjoy at bedtime.
author: Christina  McDonald
